Name: Silver Fizz
Ingredients: 60 ml Brandy, whisk(e)y, gin, rum etc.
30 ml Freshly squeezed lemon or lime juice
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Top up with Soda from siphon
Instructions: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass (no ice). TOP with soda from siphon.
Review: For those, like me, who prefer their Gin Fizz with the addition of egg white.
Nutrition: One serving of Silver Fizz contains 184 calories
